name: DeepNoise
description:
A shadow is forgotten in a strange world.

The feathers call them.

The candles will burn.


                              Developed for the OST Jam Vol.2                               PLOT:

           Seek the noises, 

Collect the feathers, 

Light the candles.       

MUSIC:

Orbital Entanglement by Track

Entropeace by HaruMKT

Into the Depths by Huskotron 

Leaves In The Wind by David Olofson 

a train back to.... by Possums At Twilight

CONTROLS:           WASD          Move              Space           
     Jump              E          Interact              Esc          Pause Menu     Tips:
  • Theres 20 feathers in total. 
  • Each time you pick one, a candle will light.
  • Also each candle points (more or less) to where each feather is.
  • Every interactive thing has sound feedback.
